starts.title: Both players make yucky faces at each other
Both players touch their foreheads to the floor

examples.title: Both players make exaggerated gag faces at each other
examples.extra: Freeze the face for a photo‑worthy 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players describe the 'worst smell' you can imagine
examples.extra: Act it out with silly sniffing and coughing sounds

examples.title: Both players mime chewing something awful together
examples.extra: Offer each other an imaginary 'sample' and recoil

examples.title: Current player air‑wafts a shoe toward the other from 1 foot away (pretend only)
examples.extra: Switch roles and do one quick waft again

examples.title: Both players pretend to find 'mystery goo' under a table
examples.extra: Touch it with one fingertip in slow motion and shudder together

examples.title: Both players dab imaginary 'stink cream' on each other's cheeks
examples.extra: Do a synchronized 'ewww' while holding eye contact

examples.title: Both players sniff the air above each other's shoulder
examples.extra: Rate the pretend stink from 1–5

examples.title: Current player offers the other an imaginary spoon of 'trash soup'
examples.extra: Trade 'bites' and overreact dramatically

examples.title: Both players take a 3‑inch sock sniff (quick single whiff)
examples.extra: Swap socks for a second single whiff

examples.title: Both players describe the texture of 'cursed oatmeal'
examples.extra: Pretend to swallow a lump and grimace together

examples.title: Both players pretend to pick gum off the bottom of a chair
examples.extra: Stretch it like slime between your fingers (mime)

examples.title: Current player performs a dramatic 'fake sneeze' into elbow
examples.extra: Other says 'ew' and hands an imaginary tissue; then switch

examples.title: Both players sniff a pretend rotten egg you 'found'
examples.extra: Lean in closer for a second sniff and stagger away

examples.title: Both players apply imaginary 'stink cologne' to each other
examples.extra: Waft it onto neck and wrist (no actual contact needed)

examples.title: Current player pretends to scrape gunk from the other's shoe
examples.extra: Swap roles and 'flick' it away with a gross sound

examples.title: Both players invent a revolting sandwich, layer by layer
examples.extra: Mime feeding each other one theatrical 'bite'

examples.title: Current player pretends to burp into their elbow; the other fans it back
examples.extra: Switch roles and overreact

examples.title: Both players sniff each other's sleeve near the wrist
examples.extra: Hold the sniff for a brave 2 seconds

examples.title: Both players do a 'gross taste test' with imaginary spoons
examples.extra: Trade your worst 'flavor notes' and do one more 'taste'

examples.title: Both players draw a ketchup 'mustache' on yourselves
examples.extra: Help each other 'wipe' it off with exaggerated disgust

examples.title: Current player pretends to lick a finger with mystery sauce; the other says 'ew!'
examples.extra: Switch roles and lean closer for the reveal

examples.title: Both players smell each other's palms (quick single sniff)
examples.extra: Rate the imaginary scent and switch hands

examples.title: Both players place noses near each other's shoulder for a 'sniff test'
examples.extra: Hold steady for a slow count of 3

examples.title: Current player pretends to pick lint from the other's hair with over‑the‑top 'ew's
examples.extra: Switch and 'discover' something even grosser

examples.title: Both players mime scraping slime off each other's forearms
examples.extra: Finish by 'flicking' it away at the same time

examples.title: Current player pretends to spritz a 'garbage perfume' around the other
examples.extra: Circle twice and add a dramatic sniff

examples.title: Both players take turns sniffing the air near each other's armpit area from 6 inches away
examples.extra: Do one exaggerated recoil and laugh

examples.title: Both players conduct an 'extreme sniff test' of each other's shoes at arm's length
examples.extra: Count down from 5 while holding them out

examples.title: Current player mimes cleaning imaginary 'toilet monster' splatter off the other's back (over clothes)
examples.extra: Switch roles and add sound effects

examples.title: Both players hold the grossest face you can while pretending to taste 'sewer stew'
examples.extra: Try to keep it for 10 seconds
